quest.name: Meaningful Measurements
journal:
 Quest Sync
An isle surveyor is searching for an assistant.
objectives: Use the destructive magick concept on the rocky outcrop.
Deliver the ore fragments to the isle surveyor.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Would you assist me, familiar?

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: As I'm sure you are aware, the floating islands of Elpis were created to provide suitable habitats for our various creations.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: In order to maintain their respective environments, however, surveyors such as myself must make regular assessments of their aetherial composition.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: To that end, I was planning to take samples from the melanion habitat with my partner, but it seems he had an urgent engagement. Something about an unscheduled meeting with a member of the Convocation of Fourteen...

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Though I'm now faced with handling this rather grueling task alone, waiting until he returns is simply not an option. As I said, it's important to gather data at regular, specific intervals.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: And thus am I requesting your help. So, what say you? Would you be willing to accompany me in place of my partner?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Certainly.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I don't know...

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Many thanks! I'll be sure to reward you for your efforts.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Please! I'll make it worth your while. The samples must be taken at the right time!

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Right, let's hurry along, then. We'll need to make our way to the south.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: The rocks in this area contain ores that can tell us about the environmental aether. We'll have to break them apart with destructive magicks to collect the necessary samples.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: You may find that difficult with your inherent...limitations, but I have a little something to help with that.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Here, use this concept crystal to shatter an outcrop of rock, then bring any ore fragments back to me.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Start in the east, if you would. I'll start working elsewhere, and we can meet back here.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: How did you fare?

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Excellent. This should give me all the information I need. Let's head back, shall we?

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Thank you. Without your aid, I wouldn't have been able to properly observe how the introduction of melanioi has affected their habitat's aether.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: It's important to keep careful track of the environments here to make any necessary adjustments.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: The terrain, the flora, everything that makes up the habitat must be meticulously controlled to fit each subject under observation.

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN04305
dialogue.text: Though I applaud my partner's enthusiasm for learning at the foot of a Convocation member, we cannot neglect these fundamental─albeit tedious─facets of our work.

obj.n: A Past, Not Yet Come to Pass
